description: Try our easy to follow Haloumi Nicoise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Nicoise salad,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sweet potato,Tomato,Sesame free
name: Haloumi Nicoise Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup green sicilian olives, pitted, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a saucepan of water to the boil over medium-high heat. Add sweet potato and cook for 12 minutes or until tender. Remove with tongs and set aside to cool. Meanwhile, add eggs to the boiling water and cook for 7 minutes for soft boiled. Set aside.

Combine 1/4 cup of the oil, mustard, lemon juice and zest in a small jug. Season to taste and set aside. Heat remaining oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add halloumi and cook for 2 minutes each side or until golden.
Slice sweet potatoes and peel and halve eggs. Combine all ingredients in serving bowls. Drizzle with dressing and serve with lemon wedges.
